title: Mahiru no Hyakki Yakou
description: Annoying neighbor, Zoku Zoku !! Satori who reads the heart of a person. Make an ominous prophecy. Kappa is chasing after imitation. The modern times when the mountains turned into isolat and the darkness of the night was removed. Yokai appear in the streets in the middle of the day! How can we co-exist with those who are not angry but annoying? The modern monster miracle drawn by the novelist Hikaru Higa with plenty of emotion!
